name: init(coordinateRegion:interactionModes:showsUserLocation:userTrackingMode:annotationItems:annotationContent:)
desc: Creates a map that displays a coordinate region with annotations, and optionally configures available interactions, user location, and tracking behavior.
declaration: init<Items, Annotation>(coordinateRegion: Binding<MKCoordinateRegion>, interactionModes: MapInteractionModes = .all, showsUserLocation: Bool = false, userTrackingMode: Binding<MapUserTrackingMode>? = nil, annotationItems: Items, annotationContent: @escaping (Items.Element) -> Annotation) where Content == _DefaultAnnotatedMapContent<Items>, Items : RandomAccessCollection, Annotation : MapAnnotationProtocol, Items.Element : Identifiable
